item.text: But we who are strong ought to bear with the failings of the weak, and not just please ourselves.

Let <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="700" class="">please</st> his <st data-num="4139" class="">neighbor</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> his <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3619" class="">build</st> him <st data-num="3619">up</st>.
For even Christ did not please himself, but just as it is written, “The insults of those who insult you have fallen on me.”

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">everything</st> that was <st data-num="4270" class="">written in former times</st> was <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2251" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1319" class="">instruction</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="5281" class="">endurance</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3874" class="">encouragement</st> of the <st data-num="1124" class="">scriptures</st> we may <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> may the <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="5281" class="">endurance</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3874" class="">comfort</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5426" class="">unity</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">with</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2596">in accordance with</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>,
so that together you may with one voice glorify the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Receive one another, then, just as Christ also received you, to God’s glory.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> you that <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> has <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> a <st data-num="1249" class="">servant</st> of the <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcised</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5228">on behalf of</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="950" class="">confirm</st> the <st data-num="1860" class="">promises</st> made to the <st data-num="3962" class="">fathers</st>,<n id="2" />
and thus the Gentiles glorify God for his mercy. As it is written, “Because of this I will confess you among the Gentiles, and I will sing praises to your name.”
And again it says: “Rejoice, O Gentiles, with his people.”
And again, “Praise the Lord all you Gentiles, and let all the peoples praise him.”
And again Isaiah says, “The root of Jesse will come, and the one who rises to rule over the Gentiles, in him will the Gentiles hope.”
Now may the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you believe in him, so that you may abound in hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
But I myself am fully convinced about you, my brothers and sisters, that you yourselves are full of goodness, filled with all knowledge, and able to instruct one another.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I have <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> <st data-num="5112">more boldly</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="575" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3313">some points</st> <st data-num="5613">so as</st> to <st data-num="1878" class="">remind</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1223">because of</st> the <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5259">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>
to be a minister of Christ Jesus to the Gentiles. I serve the gospel of God like a priest, so that the Gentiles may become an acceptable offering, sanctified by the Holy Spirit.
So I boast in Christ Jesus about the things that pertain to God.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5111" class="">dare</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> of <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">except</st> <st data-num="3739">what</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> has <st data-num="2716" class="">accomplished</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in order to</st> bring about the <st data-num="5218" class="">obedience</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>, by <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deed</st>,

<st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> of <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5059" class="">wonders</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st>. <st data-num="5620" class="">So</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="2945 3360">as far as</st> <st data-num="2437" class="">Illyricum</st> I have <st data-num="4137">fully preached</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3779">in this way</st> I <st data-num="5389" class="">desire</st> to <st data-num="2097" class="">preach</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> has <st data-num="3756">not</st> been <st data-num="3687" class="">named</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> as <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="3618" class="">build</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="245">another person’s</st> <st data-num="2310" class="">foundation</st>,
but as it is written: “Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand.”
This is the reason I was often hindered from coming to you.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3570" class="">now</st> there is <st data-num="3371 5117">nothing</st> more to keep me<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="2824" class="">regions</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="575" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2425" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st> <st data-num="1974" class="">desired</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>
when I go to Spain. For I hope to visit you when I pass through and that you will help me on my journey there, after I have enjoyed your company for a while.
But now I go to Jerusalem to minister to the saints.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3109" class="">Macedonia</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="882" class="">Achaia</st> are <st data-num="2106" class="">pleased</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="2842" class="">contribution</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st> among the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> they were <st data-num="2106" class="">pleased</st> to do this, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> indeed they <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3781" class="">indebted</st> to the <st data-num="846" class="">Jerusalem saints</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> have <st data-num="2841" class="">shared</st> in <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4152">spiritual things</st>, they are <st data-num="3784" class="">obligated</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> to <st data-num="3008" class="">minister</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4559">material things</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> after I have <st data-num="2005" class="">completed</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have <st data-num="4972">safely delivered</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">bounty</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="565">set out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4681" class="">Spain</st> <st data-num="1223">by way of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,
and I know that when I come to you, I will come in the fullness of Christ’s blessing.
Now I urge you, brothers and sisters, through our Lord Jesus Christ and through the love of the Spirit, to join fervently with me in prayer to God on my behalf.

Pray<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">that</st> I may be <st data-num="4506" class="">rescued</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> those who are <st data-num="544" class="">disobedient</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> that <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> may <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2144" class="">acceptable</st> to the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st>,

<st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> I may <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> and be <st data-num="4875" class="">refreshed</st> in <st data-num="4771">your</st> company.
Now may the God of peace be with all of you. Amen.
